articles.title: Leicester plot transfer swoop for Levi Colwill as Chelsea could offload the 19-year-old this summer - Daily Mail
articles.description: Leicester City have been alerted to the fact Chelsea could sell highly-rated Levi Colwill this window.However, Leicester want to sell players such as Jannik Vestergaard first.
articles.content:
Leicester City and Crystal Palace have been alerted to the fact Chelsea could sell highly-rated Levi Colwill this window.
